Package prj02

Class HuffmanCoding

java.lang.Object
prj02.HuffmanCoding
public class HuffmanCoding
extends java.lang.Object
The Huffman Encoding Algorithm This is a data compression algorithm designed by David A. Huffman and published in 1952 What it does is it takes a string and by constructing a special binary tree with the frequencies of each character. This tree generates special prefix codes that make the size of each string encoded a lot smaller, thus saving space.
Since:
10/16/2021
Version:
2.0
Author:
Fernando J. Bermudez Medina (Template), A. ElSaid (Review), Orlando G. Mercado Tellado 802-19-0377 (Implementation)

    • compute_fd

      public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> compute_fd​(java.lang.String inputString)
      Receives a string and returns a map with the symbol frequency distribution.
      Parameters:
      inputString - the string whose characters(symbol) are going to be counted and stored in a map.
      Returns:
      Map with symbols as keys and frequency as values of each key.

    • huffman_tree

      public static Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> huffman_tree​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> fD)
      Receives a map with the frequency distribution and returns a root node of the created Huffman tree.
      Parameters:
      fD - the map with the frequency-symbol distribution.
      Returns:
      the root of the created Huffman tree.

    • huffman_code

      public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> huffman_code​(Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> huffmanRoot)
      Receives the root of a Huffman tree and returns a mapping of every symbol to its corresponding Huffman code.
      Parameters:
      huffmanRoot - the root of the Huffman tree
      Returns:
      a map with the symbols as keys and the Huffman code as the value of each key

    • encode

      public static java.lang.String encode​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> encodingMap, java.lang.String inputString)
      Receives the Huffman code map and the input string and returns the encoded string.
      Parameters:
      encodingMap - the map containing the symbols and their corresponding Huffman code.
      inputString - the string to encode.
      Returns:
      the encoded string.

    • process_results

      public static void process_results​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> fD, HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> encodedHuffman, java.lang.String inputData, java.lang.String output)
      Receives the frequency distribution map, the Huffman Prefix Code HashTable, the input string, and the output string, and prints the results to the screen (per specifications). Output Includes: symbol, frequency and code. Also includes how many bits has the original and encoded string, plus how much space was saved using this encoding algorithm
      Parameters:
      fD - Frequency Distribution of all the characters in input string
      encodedHuffman - Prefix Code Map
      inputData - text string from the input file
      output - processed encoded string

    • decodeHuff

      public static java.lang.String decodeHuff​(java.lang.String output, HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> lookupTable)
      Auxiliary Method that decodes the generated string by the Huffman Coding Algorithm Used for output Purposes
      Parameters:
      output - Encoded String
      lookupTable - the map with symbol-Huffman code elements.
      Returns:
      The decoded String, this should be the original input string parsed from the input file

    • huffman_codeAux

      public static java.lang.String huffman_codeAux​(Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> btNode, java.lang.String letter)
      Auxiliary Method that returns the Huffman code of a symbol as a string.
      Parameters:
      btNode - root of the Huffman tree.
      letter - the letter whose Huffman code will be created.
      Returns:
      a string containing the Huffman code of the given letter.
